en.title: Math & CS Mentor
en.text: Mentored high school students in CS and math, helping improve academic performance and graduation readiness.

en.title: Web Developer Intern
en.text: Maintained and improved Westminster University's website with a focus on analytics and user experience.
list: Maintained website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap
Analyzed GA4 data to improve decision-making with visualizations of user behavior
Collaborated with marketing staff to ensure content accuracy and visual consistency

en.title: Undergraduate Researcher
en.text: Recived Grants from Westminster Univeristy to conduct Research on the effectivness of ReCaptchas against Bot attacks
list: Used Selenium and Python with OpenAI API calls to create a bot that solves CAPTCHA problems
Identified the strengths and weaknesses of different types of CAPTCHA challenges
Presented research at Salt Lake Community College and Geek Fest

en.title: CS Research Intern
en.text: Conducted AI-powered research to assist wildlife biology studies focused on pelicans.
list: Trained YOLO model using Python to detect pelican beaks and horns
Performed statistical analysis in R to draw ecological insights
Presented research at Salt Lake Community College and Geek Fest
Helped secure project funding by communicating findings to broad audiences

en.title: Discrete Math Grader
en.text: Graded assignments with close attention to accuracy and detail, supporting learning objectives in discrete mathematics.

en.title: IT Support
en.text: Provided technical support to students, faculty, and staff. Resolved hardware/software issues and assisted with network and account troubleshooting.
